title: Betrayal
description: On a golden day in early summer, two young boys meet in the crowded streets of Florence and change the lives of a man and a woman forevermore...For seventeen years Ash has been eaten up alive by bitterness and hatred, caught fast in the clutches of the past. For seventeen years he has not been able to look at the boy he raised as his heir and not remember the terrible betrayal he had to endure. And yet, for seventeen years he has closed his eyes against the even more terrible truth ...Seventeen years ago Georgina fled from England and all she ever held dear. But for the sake of her child, she must return to confront the man whom she once loved more than life itself until lies and deceit tore her life and marriage apart.Will their love stand a second chance?
author: Sandra Schwab
